# UIStatusBarHidden

**Property List Key**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the system initially hides the status bar when the app launches.

## Discussion

If `YES`, the system hides the status bar. If `NO`, it displays the status bar.

## Status bar

- **UIStatusBarStyle**: The style of the status bar as the app launches.
- **UIStatusBarTintParameters**: The status bar tint.
- **UIViewControllerBasedStatusBarAppearance**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the system bases the appearance of the status bar on the style preferred by the current view controller.
